Articles.Content: Just what the title says. Just lost a major expedition because i was to focused on a Perapsis in mao view just to hear "BOOM" then one engine is gone.
For a short term fix, you should consider using KER or MechJeb's features to show your orbit parameters while in space view, avoiding the need to be in map view for an extended period.
Also, if you're not opposed to mods, [HeatWarning](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116773-1-0-HeatWarning/) adds this feature.
A warning in map view gets my vote. Any warning or alarm should really make itself known in all screens or views.
